Click the `Preview` tab and select a PR template:

- [Modify release permission](?expand=1&template=modify_release_permission.md)
  Use this when you want to add or remove maintainers or adopt a plugin.
- [Enable CD](?expand=1&template=enable_cd.md)
  Use this when you want to enable plugin releases via Github actions for your plugin. See [Releasing CD](https://www.jenkins.io/doc/developer/publishing/releasing-cd/) for more details.
- [Other](?expand=1&template=other.md)
  This is a blank template intended for changes to the RPU code itself.

Please choose the right template. PR using the wrong template will be closed.
